question.questionText: Grace set up a science experiment. Here's what she wrote in her notebook. First I put eggshells into a cup and covered them with vinegar. After a while, small bubbles appeared on the surface of the eggshells. The next day there were more bubbles. In a couple of days, the eggshells were gone and the liquid was clear. I think I made a solution and a reaction. Explain why Grace thinks she made a reaction.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: A reaction was indicated by the bubbles of gas (a new material) being produced.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Because of the bubbles on the shell.
Because the vinegar is a reaction to eggshells and because of the reaction the eggshells are gone.
Because she added more than 2 chemicals producing the small bubbles on the eggshells that dissolved.
